sentences.sContent: games suitable for specific age groups
sentences.sCn: 适合特定年龄组的游戏

sentences.sContent: a specific example of alcohol’s effect on the body
sentences.sCn: 酒精对身体影响的具体例子

sentences.sContent: ...or even copied and pirated specific French designs...
...Marketers must qualify their claims on the product packaging and limit them to a specific benefit...
...technological progress has always eliminated some specific jobs...
...but that we offer to pay for something specific like travel or something...
...Yudell said scientists need to get more specific with their language...
...with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity-parks...
...a nonprofit organization launched last October to reach out to this specific population of students...
...these schools are ill-equipped to graduate these students-young adults who face specific challenges and obstacles...
...but these reports typically only include Pell recipient numbers-not necessarily rates specific to first-generation students...
...While students overseas usually must demonstrate expertise in a specific field...
...with a series of short chapters dedicated to specific aspects of urbanity - parks...
...IDPs have long been used by government agencies and the private sector to achieve specific goals for the employee and the organization...
...where managers used financial incentives to motivate salesmen to meet specific revenue goals...
...by gauging the reactions to our self-disclosures we learn what types are acceptable or unacceptable with particular people and in specific situations...
...Both can succeed depending on the specific situation...

synos.tran: 特殊的，特定的；明确的；详细的；[药]具有特效的

phrases.pCn: 比表面；比表面积；表面系数
特殊请求；详细而具体的请求

words.tran: 专业，专长；特产；特性；招牌菜
[免疫] 特异性；特征；专一性
指定；详细说明（specify的过去分词）
专攻（specialize的过去分词）；使…专门化；详细说明
指定；详细说明；列举；把…列入说明书

trans.tranOther: a specific thing, person, or group is one particular thing, person, or group
